DOC.detailed_description: This observational , retrospective , propensity-score match cohort study use Manitoba Immunization Monitoring System ( MIMS ) hospital , physician , prescription claim databases Manitoba Health ( MH ) Database System assess Arepanrix™ vaccination 2009 pandemic associate increased risk multiple sclerosis ( MS ) demyelinate condition ultimately lead multiple sclerosis diagnosis Manitoba , Canada . The data collect form follow link database : - Manitoba Health ( MH ) administrative database - Manitoba Immunization Monitoring System ( MIMS ) - Manitoba Health Population Registry ( MHPR ) - Drug Program Information Network ( DPIN ) - Hospital Abstract Database - The Medical Services database
